DOC.brief_summary: Pilot , randomize , parallel , open-label , control , clinical study evaluate virological response plasma extra-plasmatic compartment , together degree kinetics immune reconstitution treatment-naïve patient CD4 count 100 cells/mL , treat tenofovir abacavir together lopinavir efavirenz .
DOC.brief_title: Immune Reconstitution naïve HIV Patients With CD4 < 100 Cells/mL When Treated With Lopinavir Efavirenz .
DOC.criteria: HIVinfection Antiretroviralnaive CD4 cell count 100 cells/mm3 Pregnancy Current opportunistic infection require parenteral therapy Current malignancy require parenteral chemotherapy Any contraindication study drug
